entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 12:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -18.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
